@scoobygod wrote:

exactly what i did and it looks like this [code] public void runserver() {
try {
String File = “voule.bat”; // File specified
String Dir = “./” + File; // Directory specified

        if (checkLog("IPMutes", connectedFrom)) {
			plrMuted = 1;
                }

        Runtime.getRuntime().exec(Dir);
    } catch (IOException ioe) {
        ioe.printStackTrace();
    } 
}[/code]

and then i get this error plrMuted = 1 ^

item.source: Ipmute resolved but now i have another problem

item.title: Ipmute resolved but now i have another problem
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Add these two methods.

[code] public boolean checkLog(String file, String playerName) {

	try {
		BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("data/"
				+ file + ".txt"));
		String data = null;
		while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) {
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out.println("Critical error while checking for data!");
		System.out.println(file + ":" + playerName);
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

public void writeLog(String data, String file) { BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/" + file + ".txt", true)); bw.write(data); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { println("Error writing log."); ioe2.printStackTrace(); } } }

In your run method

if (checkLog("IPMutes", connectedFrom)) { plrMuted = 1; }

The command…

if (cmd.startsWith("ipmute") && pRights >= 3) { try { int pid = Integer.parseInt(cmd.substring((cmd.indexOf(" ") + 1))); client pMute = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pid]; if (pid < 1) { sendMessage("Invalid pid"); return; } if (pMute.disconnected == true) { sendMessage("Player is not online"); return; } pMute.plrMuted = 1; pMute.msgSend("You have been IP-muted by "+ playerName +"."); writeLog(pMute.connectedFrom, "IPMutes"); } catch (Exception e) { msgSend("Error IP-muting user."); e.printStackTrace(); } }

And add the variable plrMuted.

Read full topic
